post:
We have the following server that we're not needing anymore:

- 2 x L5420 CPU's with heatsinks
- 4 x 500GB Samsung SATA2 drives
- X7DBR-3 Supermicro Motherboard
- 8 x 2GB FBDDR RAM
- Supermicro chassis - http://www.supermicro.com/products/c...C815TQ-560.cfm - In black.

- Riser card included
- Rails included

$400 + shipping.

Shipping is around $50 anywhere in the US. Local pick up is also available.

Francisco
